title: Announcing En Route avec Coffee Break French
itunes:title: Announcing En Route avec Coffee Break French
itunes:subtitle: In this special edition of Coffee Break French, Mark announces the new series in which you can join the Coffee Break French team, "en route". Listen to a sneak preview of some of the many interviews with native speakers and learn more about t...
description:
In this special edition of Coffee Break French, Mark announces the new series in which you can join the Coffee Break French team, "en route". Listen to a sneak preview of some of the many interviews with native speakers and learn more about the forthcoming series. This episode is the first of two special announcements from Coffee Break French.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
